lead.p: random â€” Returns a random floating point value between 0 and 1.

example.heading: random example
example.code: console.log(Math.random()); // A random float between 0 and 1. console.log(Math.random() * 100); // A random float between 0 and 100. console.log(Math.floor(Math.random() * 11)); // A random integer between 0 and 10.
